subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Higher usage limits on GPT-4o, GPT-4, and advanced data analysis; subject to dynamic caps.
5x the usage of the free tier, with the ability to create more projects and chats. Fair use and capacity limits apply.

pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression among leading frontier models. New releases like GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet are priced significantly lower than their immediate predecessors (GPT-4 Turbo, Claude 3 Opus), establishing a new, lower price-performance benchmark for high-capability models. The market is segmenting between ultra-low-cost, high-speed models (like Claude 3 Haiku at $0.25/million input) and highly capable, moderately priced models.
